subject: Hockey, Ice
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Propelled by three goals from Wayne Simmonds, the Flyers forced a Game 7 and extended the Rangers’ streak of 12 straight defeats while holding a lead in a playoff series.
snippet: Propelled by three goals from Wayne Simmonds, the Flyers forced a Game 7 and extended the Rangers’ streak of 12 straight defeats while holding a lead in a playoff series.
